message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.SD

This paper proposes a machine learning approach for classification of temporal sequences using dynamic time warping and multiple local Mahalanobis distance metrics. The paper focuses on the development of a learning framework for multiple metric learning, which is a common problem in machine learning and falls under the category of supervised learning. The paper also discusses the use of linear programming to solve the optimization problem. Based on these factors, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), and cs.SD (Sound).
